content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Electricity generator at position(0, 0)
Consists of steam engine (position 0, 0), boiler (position 0, 0) and offshore pump (position 0, 0)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace at position(0, 0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace at position(0, 0)
- Assembling machine at position(0, 0) and inserter at position(0, 0) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 0, 0) that connects the furnace at position 0, 0 to assembling machine at position(0, 0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to access non-existent entities
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to access is actually present on the map at the specified position. Verify the position coordinates before attempting to retrieve an entity.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities at the target position.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
